page.title: 02FARMING - PENALLT
page.content: {MAINLY UNDER 100 ACRES.STOCK AND DAIRY SHEEP-Welsh Ewes,Suffolk,Beaulieu. CATTLE-Friesian. CROPS-Hay and kale. LAND-Undulating,steep. PESTS-Moles,rabbits,badgers,foxes,tape worms. PREMISES-Owned.Extra land sometimes rented. OUTBUILDINGS-Stone barns,covered yards,sheds. WATER-Mains and spring. MARKET-Monmouth.Monday-sheep and calves.Friday-cattle. ADMINISTRATIVE WORK-Done by wives. Butter, cheese and cider made for own consumption. LEISURE ACTIVITIES-Breeding racing pigeons,training sheepdogs,swimming, walking,old vehicles and machinery, shows and rallies.
